knimeNode.name: Intellij Metrics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Intellij Metrics. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from Intellij Metrics report (XML format). Only sourcefile is retrieved.
The report must be generated using XML Export format. For further information about report generation please refer to Intellij Inspect Code documentation, section: Class Metrics here.

Please check workflow examples here.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid xml report file from Intellij or a directory containg many of them.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the Intellij Metrics file grouped by class.
